name: Curved Walnut Dining Chair - Velvet
description: The Curved Walnut Dining Chair represents both luxury and comfort. The plush curves offer a reimagined modern take on 1970's design. Rich warm walnut is paired with soft buttery velvet creating a show stopping elegant dining chair. The fixed seat is made with the highest quality foam padding and upholstered in a brand new velvet colourway, crafted for hours of comfortable dining. The seamlessly curved wooden frame is made from solid ash which has been stained a rich walnut.
